name: The Darkest Hour II - Reincarnation DEMO
name_original: The Darkest Hour II - Reincarnation DEMO
description:
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

WARNING!
This game is entirely fictitious and is meant for mature audiences only. This game includes extreme graphic violence in the form of medical procedures and should not be experienced by easily affected individuals. 

This game is in DEMO, expect some bugs. Full game release not yet confirmed.

THIS GAME DOESN'T SUPPORT GOOGLE SLIDES, LIBRE PRO, AND WPS OFFICE! ONLY USE POWERPOINT OR POWERPOINT VIEWER!

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Congratulations! You have been connected to the main computer. You have one goal, to restore your gene tree by saving the lives of your relatives.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

This game is inspired from jmtb02's Dark Cut Series!

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

MOST ASSETS HERE BELONG TO THEIR RIGHTFUL OWNERS

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

SYSTEM MINIMUM REQUIREMENTS:
Processor [Intel Core i3-540 or better]
Graphics [Intel HD Integrated Graphics (any version)]
RAM [4GB or more]
PowerPoint Version [2013 or above]

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
